name: pnp-perform-operations-not-covered-by-cli-for-microsoft-365
title: How to perform operations if a command is not covered by the CLI for Microsoft 365
shortDescription: This script shows how to perform operations if a command is not covered by the CLI for Microsoft 365.
longDescription: One of the most powerful tools a Microsoft 365 user has is the CLI for Microsoft 365. The command line allows any user to get a lot of things done in a fast way. There is no boundary to the number of things a seasoned user can do by merely using the CLI for Microsoft 365. This script shows how to perform operations if a command is not covered by the CLI for Microsoft 365.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
